original_title: When the Circus Came to Town
overview: A small town guy named Daniel falls in love with Ashish from the circus. Two days before the circus was scheduled to leave the town, Ashish proposes Daniel, asks him to join and travel with him. It was everything Daniel had ever dreamed of; yet, all of his fears and insecurities come rushing to the surface. What will be Daniel's decision? Will he be successful to take a fairy tale decision in this practical life? Finally, life is also a circus jumbling in between reality and dreams.
title: When the Circus Came to Town
